articles.title: Malaria death toll to exceed Covid-19's in sub-Saharan Africa -WHO - ETHealthworld.com
articles.description: Deaths from malaria due to disruptions during the coronavirus pandemic to services designed to tackle the mosquito-borne disease will far exceed those killed by Covid-19 in sub-Saharan Africa, the World Health Organization warned on Monday.
